mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LEASELOAN( LEASELOAN_ID, LEASELOAN_DCLS_MONTH, LEASELOAN_FIN_CO_NO, LEASELOAN_KOR_CO_NM, LEASELOAN_FIN_PRDT_CD, LEASELOAN_FIN_PRDT_NM, LEASELOAN_JOIN_WAY, LEASELOAN_LOAN_INCI_EXPN, LEASELOAN_ERLY_RPAY_FEE, LEASELOAN_DLY_RATE, LEASELOAN_LOAN_LMT, LEASELOAN_DCLS_STRT_DAY, LEASELOAN_DCLS_END_DAY, LEASELOAN_FIN_CO_SUBM_DAY ) VALUES( #{id}, #{dclsMonth}, #{finCoNo}, #{korCoNm}, #{finPrdtCd}, #{finPrdtNm}, #{joinWay}, #{loanInciExpn}, #{erlyRpayFee}, #{dlyRate}, #{loanLmt}, #{dclsStrtDay}, #{dclsEndDay}, #{finCoSubmDay} )
mapper.select:
SELECT l.leaseloan_id, l.leaseloan_kor_co_nm, l.leaseloan_fin_prdt_nm, l.leaseloan_join_way, l.leaseloan_loan_inci_expn, l.leaseloan_erly_rpay_fee, l.leaseloan_dly_rate, l.leaseloan_loan_lmt, o.leaseloan_rpay_type_nm, o.leaseloan_lend_rate_type_nm, o.leaseloan_lend_rate_min, o.leaseloan_lend_rate_max, o.leaseloan_lend_rate_avg FROM LEASELOAN l JOIN LEASELOAN_OPTION o ON l.leaseloan_id = o.leaseloan_id JOIN (SELECT leaseloan_id, MAX(leaseloan_lend_rate_max) MAX_RATE FROM LEASELOAN_OPTION GROUP BY leaseloan_id) C ON C.leaseloan_id = l.leaseloan_id AND c.MAX_RATE = o.leaseloan_lend_rate_max
WHERE l.leaseloan_kor_co_nm LIKE '%'||#{korCoNm}||'%'
ORDER BY
l.leaseloan_id o.leaseloan_lend_rate_min l.leaseloan_kor_co_nm

SELECT l.leaseloan_id, l.leaseloan_kor_co_nm, l.leaseloan_fin_prdt_nm, l.leaseloan_join_way, l.leaseloan_loan_inci_expn, l.leaseloan_erly_rpay_fee, l.leaseloan_dly_rate, l.leaseloan_loan_lmt, o.leaseloan_rpay_type_nm, o.leaseloan_lend_rate_type_nm, o.leaseloan_lend_rate_min, o.leaseloan_lend_rate_max, o.leaseloan_lend_rate_avg FROM LEASELOAN l JOIN LEASELOAN_OPTION o ON l.leaseloan_id = o.leaseloan_id JOIN (SELECT leaseloan_id, MAX(leaseloan_lend_rate_max) MAX_RATE FROM LEASELOAN_OPTION GROUP BY leaseloan_id) C ON C.leaseloan_id = l.leaseloan_id AND c.MAX_RATE = o.leaseloan_lend_rate_max WHERE l.leaseloan_id = #{id}
